name: Cinnamon Roll

attributes.title: Ingredients
attributes.details: Organic white flour, cultured butter, milk, brown sugar, muscovado sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, salt, free-range eggs, and young sourdough starter

attributes.title: Allergy Info
attributes.details: This product contains wheat, gluten, milk, and eggs. It may also contain traces of nuts.

attributes.title: Shelf-life and Storage
attributes.details: Enjoy hot or toasted | Keep at room temperature for up to 2 days | For long-term storage, place in zip-lock bags and keep in the freezer for up to 3 months | Pastries should not be refrigerated | To serve from freezer, allow pastry to thaw at room temp. and then refresh in 180c oven, or toast it right away

attributes.title: Delivery
attributes.details: Sourdough bakery delivers Monday through Saturday of each week upon pre-order with ETA of 2 working days.

description: Sweet roll dough spread with cinnamon and brown sugar, topped with sweet vanilla frosting
